description.value:
Your performances are especially distracting, allowing your allies to sneak away with ease.

When you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Aid] an ally who is trying to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Create a Diversion], instead of the usual effects of Aid, you can roll a Performance check and use that result to determine the outcome of the diversion, instead of the ally rolling a Deception check.
